fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 62.60 points or 0.34% to settle at 18,285.40. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, surged 4.02% to 13.11. Adani Enterprises, Reliance Industries and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The May 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 25 May 2023.
